about_the_game:
There are many activities waiting for you in the Revived House.

Development.

Thanks to the detailed leveling system, you will be able to develop your skills in absolutely any field.

The rules of the Revived House world are very close to real life, which makes this simulator as thoughtful as possible down to the most subtle details.

During the game you will get to know not only the city and the natural areas around, but also the locals. Each character has his own character, life story and of course tasks for the main character. Interacting with the residents, you will gradually learn the traditions and culture of the town, the specifics of the internal problems and needs of the residents. By helping residents solve their problems, you are helping the city to become a better place.

City.

There will be plenty to do in a small old town. Visit the beach in the northeast and collect a collection of shells for a local souvenir shop. Go fishing or swim in the local lake. Go hiking in the mountains in the southwest. Help the farmers to sow crops in the fields and raise cattle on the southeastern outskirts of the city.

Many administrative buildings require your support and attention.

Characters.

Each non-player character has his own place of residence, occupation, adaptive daily routine, behavior and history of the past.

Craft.

You will have to master various skills, thanks to which you will be able to help residents and the city: gardening, animal husbandry, construction, cleaning and much more.

Interests.

You will also have a lot of free time to find a hobby to your liking: play street football, arrange a bike ride, learn how to do tricks on a skateboard or scooter, take photos or videos, swim in the lake or dive with a mask, collect rare monster cards, repair an old bike to participate in a motorcycle race and much more.

Holidays.

The town is located in a climatic zone where the weather has four distinct seasons.

Various holidays will be waiting for you in any weather.

"Revived House" is a game that you want to live in.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: You spend your holidays with your grandparents in the old town. The once cozy and prosperous place began to wither. You will have to revive the town in any possible way. But don't forget about the fun.
